tasks.title: ü§ñ Setup PM Agent Sub-agent
tasks.description:
Create and configure a Project Manager AI assistant that acts as PM via chat. This agent will help with:
- Breaking down tasks into subtasks
- Prioritizing work items
- Estimating effort/time
- Tracking progress across projects
- Following up on deadlines
- Documenting decisions and summaries

**Approach:** Create this as a sub-agent in OpenClaw with its own memory file for project tracking.

**Delivery:** User will interact with PM agent via Telegram - create sub-agent session that can receive messages via Telegram channel.

subtasks.title: Design PM agent identity and scope
Test PM agent with sample task breakdown

tasks.dod: PM agent responds to project management requests via chat and maintains project tracking memory

**Role:** Senior Fullstack Developer

**Requirements:**
- Senior-level fullstack development experience
- Strong system architecture skills

- Review and optimize existing architecture
- Make technical decisions (tech stack, patterns, trade-offs)
- Document architecture clearly

**Deliverables:**
1. System architecture design document
2. Architecture diagrams (if applicable)
3. Tech stack recommendations
4. Technical decisions and rationale

**Priority:** High
**Deadline:** ASAP
